variable "name"{
}


variable "autoDelete"{
    default = "true"
}


variable "boot"{
    default = "true"
}


variable "deviceName"{
    default = "boot"
}


variable "sourceImage"{
    default = "https://www.googleapis.com/compute/v1/projects/debian-cloud/global/images/family/debian-11"
}


variable "disks_type"{
    default = "PERSISTENT"
}


variable "machineType"{
    default = "https://www.googleapis.com/compute/v1/projects/some_projectzones/us-central1-f/machineTypes/f1-micro"
}


variable "accessConfigs_name"{
    default = "External NAT"
}


variable "accessConfigs_type"{
    default = "ONE_TO_ONE_NAT"
}


variable "network"{
}


variable "zone"{
    default = "us-central1-f"
}
